content:
On the category theory mailing list the category theorist Nick Gurski writes:

categories: More hiring at CWRU

In addition to hiring at least one tenure track position, the CWRU
Department of Mathematics, Applied Mathematics and Statistics is also
hiring a visiting assistant professor in pure mathematics (any area of
research). You can find our tenure track ad (deadline November 18)
here
https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs/list/20976
and our VAP ad (deadline December 15) here
https://www.mathjobs.org/jobs/list/21404.
As previously, I am happy to answer any questions.
Nick
